snippet: A zoo says it will transfer five exotic animals on Friday to the widow of the animals’ owner. The owner, Terry Thompson, released dozens of wild creatures last fall before killing himself.
abstract: Ohio's Columbus Zoo will transfer five exotic animals to Marian Thompson, widow of Terry Thompson, who released dozens of wild creatures before committing suicide in 2011; the zoo had been holding the recaptured animals under a state-issued quarantine order.
lead_paragraph: A zoo says it will transfer five exotic animals on Friday to the widow of the animals’ owner. The owner, Terry Thompson, released dozens of wild creatures last fall before killing himself.

headline.main: Ohio: Surviving Exotic Animals to Be Returned to Owner’s Widow
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Surviving Exotic Animals To Be Returned To Owner’s Widow
